r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Breckenhill. The average
  contract duration was 0.61 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $88.4K. The longest
  contract was 5.18 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.0M.
lookup_name: 'BRECKENHILL'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '69'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '12'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '17%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '31%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.17'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '556.1K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.61'
s421_mean_contract_value: '88.4K'
s425_max_duration: '5.18'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.0M'
